Goal Representation:
behavior check_email(mouse:item):
    body:
        achieve close_char(char, mouse) 
        # Ensure you are close to the mouse to interact with it
        touch(mouse)
        # Use touch behavior to interact with the mouse

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind mouse: item where:
            is_mouse(mouse)
        # Bind the mouse instance to the item identified as a mouse
        check_email(mouse)

behavior touch_mouse_to_check_email(mouse:item, computer:item):
    body:
        achieve close_char(char, mouse) # Ensure character is close to mouse
        achieve facing_char(char, computer) # Ensure character is facing the computer
        touch(mouse) # Touch the mouse to check email

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind mouse: item where:
            is_mouse(mouse) and id[mouse]==413 
        # Select mouse with ID 413
        bind computer: item where:
            is_computer(computer) and id[computer]==417
        # Select computer with ID 417
        touch_mouse_to_check_email(mouse, computer)
